com.camerontec.util.io

Interface ExternalizableData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BytesSegment, DistributedCollectionMessage, GroupMessage, HighPerformanceLogEvent, NopMessage, OperationMarshallerMessageData, ReplayRequestMessage, ReplayResponseMessage, SocketEndpoint, WriteRequestMessage

    public interface ExternalizableData
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of serializing to and deserializing from a Buffer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int deserialize(Buffer source, int offset, int length)
      Deserialize from a buffer.
      int serialize(Buffer target, int offset)
      Serialize to a buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        int serialize(Buffer target,
              int offset)
        Serialize to a buffer.
        Parameters:
        target - The target buffer.
        offset - The offset in the target buffer at which serialization should start.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes serialized.
        Throws:
        BufferOverflowException - If the target buffer has insufficient capacity as reported by Buffer.capacity().

      • deserialize

        int deserialize(Buffer source,
                int offset,
                int length)
        Deserialize from a buffer.
        Parameters:
        source - The source buffer.
        offset - The offset in the source buffer at which deserialization should start.
        length - The maximum number of bytes to deserialize.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes deserialized.
        Throws:
        BufferUnderflowException - If the source buffer is exhausted before deserialization is completed.
        IllegalStateException - If deserialization is not possible because the source buffer contains invalid data.
